title: Community Bond - Metadata
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposers have a social business product they want to build and have added a document to the attachments. They have submitted the same thing into 6 categories, all with the same limited information and most with the same text. This document doesn't even mention Cardano, blockchain or metadata. Please apply with a project which explains how your product fits with Cardano and how it addresses the challenge.
This proposer has proposed or co-proposed a number of other project with little details and/or funding requests such as:
Pharo ACM - $1
dRisk - $5
Proof of Insurance - no details
communitybond.io Integrate- no details
Community Bond -Loyalty Rewards - no details
Trade Finance and Credit Insurance - minimal details
Endangered Language Preservation - no details
Locating Culture - no details
NAGchi - no details
NAGchi Cares - no details
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan on what will actually be made and how it integrates with Cardano and metadata. Please provide a project plan on what you will produce and what the funds will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no detailed plan of what the funds will be used to produce which can be assessed against. Thus progress and success cannot be measured. It is not clear what, if anything has already been built.

f6_assessments.q0:
A problem hasn't been defined in the problem statement. The proposal doesn't show a relationship with the challenge.

The same proposal was submitted in 5 different challenges.

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-CRM-for-SME-s/369180-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-CRM-tool-for-SME/369960-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Bond-Connecting-entrepreneurs/369964-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-Metadata/369982-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-Loyalty-Rewards/369978-48088

A generic plan was presented and not compatible with the Catalyst proposals, there is no mention of Cardano, how and why blockchain technology will be used in the project. I believe that the plan in the attachment was not created for Catalyst.

How can 5 identical proposals have different budgets?

Proposals in Catalyst need to be created in the context of the challenge they are allocated. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: As the other community bond related proposals, this proposal mainly consists of placeholders and is unfinished.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan is presented and no proof for qualification is given.
f6_assessments.q2: No milestones or metrics are presented, so the proposal cannot be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal statement and solution do not refer to a transaction metadata problem as described in this challenge. Moreover, the details section of the proposal includes only titles that were not elaborated at all. It only includes a video and a link to the Bond webpage. However, after reviewing both in detail, it is not possible to find an explanation on how transaction metadata would be implemented in the service. For the lack of explanation, it is not possible to understand how the proposal helps with the goal of the challenge. I recommend elaborating the idea in better detail so the community can understand and evaluate.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal does not elaborate the idea and does not provide an actionable plan or guide. It only provides a video and a link to Bond webpage that do not explain how transaction metadata would take part of the platform. Base on the lack of that fundamental information it is not possible to assume that the project is feasible or has a possibility of success. I recommend developing the idea with a detail plan.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal does not provide deliverables, timelines, or metrics that can be audited by the community. Note that it is important for Project Catalyst to be able to track progress of project where funds are allocated. The proposal states an overall budget but do not specify for what activities is needed. For those reasons I do not consider that there's enough information to audit the progress.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has been submitted multiple times with all of the same info in each proposal. NONE of the proposals hold any information that helps us asses this proposal. The only information here is a website, and the problem they seek to solve.

solution: SME's and local businesses have limited resources, skills and time to manage their customer loyalty and marketing. Bond automates that.
experience: \+ 15 years in startups, platforms and marketplaces. Social media and other international marketing experience.
